Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.text

C-JDBC text console List of consoles controller console VirtualDataBase admin console VirtualDataBase console monitor console Design Modules in the code, a console (e.g. controller console, monitor console) is represented by a module.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ColorPrinter This class defines a ColorPrinter
Console This is the C-JDBC controller console that allows remote administration and monitoring of any C-JDBC controller.
ConsoleLauncher This class defines a ConsoleLauncher
 

Exception Summary
ConsoleException Console helper exception.
 

Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.text Description

C-JDBC text console

List of consoles

  • controller console
  • VirtualDataBase admin console
  • VirtualDataBase console
  • monitor console

Design

Modules

in the code, a console (e.g. controller console, monitor console) is represented by a module.

  • the main module is ControllerConsole
  • each module is represented by a subtype of AbstractConsoleModule
  • each module has a list of commands set in its AbstractConsoleModule.loadCommands() method

Commands

The commands follow the Command Pattern.

  • each command is represented by a subtype of ConsoleCommand
  • each command has a ConsoleCommand.parse(String) method which represents the command to execute
  • most of the command are mapped to a command on C-JDBC through MBeans
  • calls to JMX are handled by JMX proxies through RmiJmxClient
